{/* */}
Royal wedding destination in Jaipur- Pink Pearl

Your special day calls for a celebration at a Special location. So, here’s a glance at some of the reasons why Pink Pearl makes for a superb option to host wedding functions

  • Lush Green Garden Area is 65,376 sq. ft.
  • Capacity approx 3000 pax
  • Situated in Prime location – Ajmer-Jaipur Highway
  • Spacious Parking Area
  • On-site facilities, appeasement, and the high-class amenities
  • Royal Wedding Destination
  • Luxurious Stay – Pink Pearl Hotel

We have a capacious location which spreads across 65,376 sq. ft. of land. For hosting pre-wedding and other wedding functions, the spacious hall and lush green garden area is perfectly suitable for a huge-sized gathering. Whether the wedding functions consist of 10 guests or 2,000, the venue’s open-air wedding set up can host ceremonies beautifully. This location for Destination wedding in Jaipur has a huge lawn area with a seating capacity of approximately 3000 guests.

We are situated at a Prime location in the Pink city. Our spell binding and majestic marriage garden in Jaipur is easy to reach. Since we are situated in the outskirts on the highway, you will see that no congestion is there in respect of parking space (we have it in plenty), no serious traffic jams on the roads outside, very spacious interiors, etc. Also, the location is conveniently reachable from the city using various modes of transport.
